"Limited Time Quests":
"This Seasonal Event featuers Limited Time Emergency Quests.
These Limited Time Quests feature appearances from unusual enemies."

"Limited Time Quests can also be started from special Trigger Portals.

The Battle Triggers required to start them drop from Season Symbol-marked enemies, and can also be traded for at the Item Exchange Shop."
"Emergency Quests can be accepted as many times as you like, simply by using their specific Trigger Portal."
